values:
I'm legit sick to my stomach. I never want to leave my bedroom again. sometimes my legs dont want to work..my knees buckle, and i fall. I feel most alive when i'm vulnerable. 

I just saw the most gorgeous girl today. I almost threw up. I'm not pretty. I fooled myself into thinking i was actually "ok" looking. in reality i'm a fucking fat ass. My outgoing personality disguises the hurt i constantly feel, people only talk to me cuz i'm the funny, perverted fat girl. 

I wish i was different. I wish I was beautiful. I wish I could fall asleep without crying...the hardest..when I'm having someone staying over..or I'm sleeping away from him..silently. the tears fall.. hard and steady. 

i cant handle this anymore. I'm going to sleep.

my own beating heart is my worst tragedy. 

Sometimes i feel like I'm just wandering around trying to find a place where i belong. 
Sometimes i feel like i found that place. 
Sometimes i feel like my search is never going to end. 

Guess what..I went and did it again. I went and threw my heart away..on a superstar. HA. im so predictable its disgusting. 
I tell myself over and over and over.."dont get too involved you're gonna end up heartbroken. fuck Kate dont do it again" 

and like a fucking dog chasing its tail i go ahead and do it again. I'd probably be better off just being ammune to all feelings..happy; sad; scared 

I gotta play this off like its all alright. I gotta play it off like i dont care. gotta brush off my shoulder and keep on trekking. 
Sometimes i feel like my heart is suffocating me. Its hard to explain the the pain is so vivid. 

I just wish you actually cared an ounce. a fucking gram. 

i suck at life. =)
Stop falling for guys in bands. =|

<lj-phonepost journalid='10503090' dpid='5357' />





Keaton i love you so much. thank you.

It's kind of hard to say this, and even more to explain 
why I lie about you, because of all this pain 
You were never there for me and i doubt you ever will 
I feel so empty deep inside, no love could ever fill 
I dont remember much of you, memories fade away 
you will never be my father, there's nothing more to say 

Well daddy dear, now you know that this is my ode to you 
running away from what you did i can never forgive you. 
I know you'll never get this..So go on with your life 
with me as some distant memory.

Dear Whoever,
   Enclosed are my feelings, each and everyone on of them, on display for all to see. I give to you my heart, my soul, every desire..wanted or not. I'm stuck in a trance on the edge of reality bent on self destruction and mutilation of the mind. I'm an overachiever, procastinating until i fail. So say what you will and do as you please because my own beating heart is my worst tragedy.

I was lying in my bed last night staring
At a ceiling full of stars
When it suddenly hit me
I just have to let you know how I feel
We live together in a photograph of time
I look into your eyes
And the seas open up to me
I tell you I love you
And I always will
And I know you can't tell me 
I know you can't tell me

So basically I'm in a horrible mood. : ]

Im so sick of my job its rediculous. I never get anything done and it sucks, because i was hired to do photo! not fuckin casheir! you want me to casheir? DONT FUCKIN HIGHLIGHT MY NAME! god!

you know what pisses the fuck out of me...people who act like my parent or my boyfriend or something. its like stay out of my life already. if  i want to tell you stuff i'll damn well tell you, if not stfu and deal with it. dont go digging like im a hole and eventually i'll cave, cuz i wont i'll just get more pissed off til i explode. 

So yeah. I'm really missing this guy right now. its crazy. i just saw him saturday, and already i feel like its been 3852 years. : [ i hate feeling like this, i feel so voulnerable. and what REALLY sucks, is when i like a guy alot..to the degree i like this fella...i cant say no..its like it drops out of my vocabulary. NOT GOOD. i've gotten myself into some situations i regret because of my lack of the word. niiice.

..and what doesnt help is some friends of mine are going to see Boys Like Girls in Poughkeepsie on October 14th and im not. <3 niiice.

I mean its not like its their fault i cant go. Its no ones fault..it just really really really really sucks. cuz i took that date off in August thinking i was gonna go. APPARENTLY NOT. i need a fuckin miricle to get to that show. *insert heart breaking*



Oh, and BTW. i have no bed. I came home from work to find a mattress leaning up against my wall <3

Broken this fragile thing now
And I can't, I can't pick up the pieces
And I've thrown my words all around
But I can't, I can't give you a reason

I feel so broken up
And I give up 
I just want to tell you so you know

Here I go, scream my lungs out and try to get to you
You are my only one
I let go, there's just no one that gets me like you do
You are my only, my only one

Made my mistakes, let you down
And I can't, I can't hold on for too long
Ran my whole life in the ground
And I can't, I can't get up when you're gone

And something's breaking up
I feel like giving up 
I won't walk out until you know

Here I go, scream my lungs out and try to get to you
You are my only one
I let go, there's just no one who gets me like you do
You are my only, my only one

Here I go so dishonestly
Leave a note for you my only one
And I know you can see right through me
So let me go and you will find someone

Here I go, scream my lungs out and try to get to you
You are my only one
I let go, there's just no one, no one like you
You are my only, my only one
My only one
My only one
My only one
You are my only, my only one

This is definitely my second lj post today. <3 whatevs.

Autumn's coming. <333333

you have no idea how happy it makes me.


good things are going to happen in the near future. <3 i can feel it in my bones.October is just 25 days away. Halloween makes me happy..hell, October makes me the happiest. I love watching the leaves turn to beautiful shades of red and orange.

its the perfect time to put on a baggy sweatshirt and sweatpants and curl on the couch and just watch movies with your mr./ms. lovah lovah. OR you could take a walk in the park hand in hand and admire the scenery..and maybe even play in the leaves. <3 that is pure joy to me.


SO, halloween isnt TOO far away..and i've been thinking about my costume. I'm going as Joey MacIntyre and fatima's gonna be Donnie Wahlberg. haha. <3 its gonna be "the right stuff". lmao. I'm so cheesy.

well its getting late, and i would like to go read the book i bought.


so see ya later kiddies. <3
Kate xx Hollywood

Love. <3



 
Life. <3






goodbye summer fling. Hello autumn love.

I've changed myself to be more what you need, but it still feels like in stuck on the "acquaintance plateau". I guess it takes a little bit more than just a change in personality..

Everything reminds me of you..
It rained last night, and i just sat here listening to it, PRAYING it would thunder. The thunder always makes me smile now. <3

I really think it would be nice if you came online and IMed me. cuz i miss you a little bit more than i should. 

..I've been having wonderful dreams lately. <3 I smile from the minute i wake up til the minute i fall asleep. cuz i know in my dream world you will be mine, and we can look into each others eyes and i'd know you cared.


anyways,
Life is going so good right now. I feel like im finally getting to the point i want to be at. <3

not ever descriptive but whatever. <3


im out with haste, (haha taylor)

Kate xx Hollywood

and all these stupid silly songs
keep trying to catch your ear
i'm trying desperately
it's just so hard to persevere
and even if you listened
i never had much to say
cause it's the same old song
i've written for the day

shelter me oh genius words
just give me strength
just to pen these things
and give me peace to well her wings
and oh carry on all you minstrels of the world
we will catch our ladies ear
we will win for us the girl

all these minstrels through the ages
that is really all we are
simply singing for the girl
that makes us try so very hard
to craft the perfect limerick
to wield unending woe
to write such silly songs
and the different never know

shelter me oh genius words
just give me strength
just to pen these things
and give me peace to well her wings
and oh carry on all you minstrels of the world
we will catch our ladies ear
we will win for us the girl

and i'll hold on to the dream
of this beggar's plea and optimistic fantasy
just hold the hand and drop the knee
you're facing love
you're embracing melody

shelter me oh genius words
just give me strength
just to pen these things
and give me peace to well her wings
and oh carry on all you minstrels of the world
we will catch our ladies ear
we will win for us the girl

and oh carry on, oh carry on all you minstrels of the world
we will catch our ladies ear
we will win for us the girl

this..this is where I want to be. Somewhere where the sun is setting and the night life is just pounding to come alive. California. Thats where I belong. Where the boys are just as gorgeous as the girls. I'm California Dreaming HxC! I want to go there so bad. Just for a little while. Just to live the life I've dreamt of. To live some place where you arent judged by the way you dress, but for the way you act..California...my heart is with you.

So today I decided to get a new live journal. I didn't really use the old one because I hated my user name. I got a different account, so now I can post voice posts on this. Ha ha I'll probably end up doing that more often than not because I'm lazy as shit. Also, I have decided to finally cut of meat from my diet. I have wanted to for a while, I was just to naive about it. Well now I've done research, and it seems that if I follow a simple yet, nutritious diet, I can live a good healthy life without meat! 

My graduation party is on saturday..and I have the worst feeling that most of the "friends" I invited won't show up. It would be nice if they told me, I know a couple that told me already that they can't come, but the people who haven't said a word to me about the party since I gave them an invite...come on! Totally not cool.

Well I'm gonna go, because my sunburn kills. <3


peace love and chicken wings;;
Kate x Hollywood
